desc:
Active: Unholy Rage - Increases Lifesteal percentage to 200% for 4.0 seconds.
Passive: Lifesteal - Heals the attacker for a percentage of attack damage dealt.

Satanic is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifier.
attrib:
+ 20 Damage
+ 25 Strength
+ 5Armor
LIFESTEAL: 25%
UNHOLY RAGE LIFESTEAL: 200%
UNHOLY RAGE DURATION: 4
lore: Immense power at the cost of your soul.
